meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Recruit</kanji> and <kanji>gather</kanji> everyone to the <kanji>middle</kanji>. They're all here gathering for this recruitment because we're <vocabulary>now hiring</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>now recruiting</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
